intro: Psychotria rhinocerotis, commonly known as the rhinoceros plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking red or orange flowers, which are often clustered in dense inflorescences. It typically grows as an herbaceous perennial, reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Psychotria rhinocerotis is also notable for its medicinal properties, traditionally used in various indigenous healing practices.
